reviewText: Hello Rock fans, I bought this DVD, its a region 0. I live in the U.S.; so it didn't play on my DVD player. I played it on my friend's computer, it worked.  This is a Killer DVD, I know, I'm 47. It has a Black sab kind of sound, Killer! Now, I have to be "careful" when looking for their CDs and DVDs. I want to make sure it's Oliver and Dawson, late.
